[] Black Friday Instant Setup - Poland Dedicated Servers ★ Gdańsk Datacenter ★ ʟɪᴍɪᴛᴇᴅ sᴛᴏᴄᴋ

Artnet was established in the year 1996 offering its clients complex IT solutions & professional Internet services. In 1997 we have become licensed operator receiving a concession from the Ministry of Communication. The same year we launched our first WWW and mail server. In 1999 we started providing Internet for customers on the fibre network.

Note: Please note that these servers are limited in stock & is provisioned on a first-come, first pay basis. So to grab one of them, proceed with the payment immediately when you place the order. We cannot reserve any of them as the order process is automated.

CPU Memory Storage Data Transfer Port Price
Intel E3-1241v3 (4x3.5GHz) 8GB 500GB SATA 5TB 100Mbps $55/mo
Intel E3-1241v3 (4x3.5GHz) 16GB 1TB SATA 5TB 100Mbps $60/mo
Intel E3-1241v3 (4x3.5GHz) 16GB 2x1TB SATA 5TB 100Mbps $65/mo
Intel E3-1240v6 (4x3.7GHz) 8GB 2x250GB NVMe SSD + 1TB SATA 5TB 100Mbps $75/mo
Intel E3-1240v6 (4x3.7GHz) 16GB 500GB NVMe SSD + 1TB SATA 5TB 100Mbps $78/mo
Intel E5-1650v4 (6x3.6GHz) 32GB 2x480GB SSD 5TB 200Mbps $109/mo
Intel E5-2620v4 (8x2.1GHz) 64GB 960GB SSD 5TB 200Mbps $122/mo
Intel E5-2630v4 (10x2.2GHz) 64GB 4x960GB SSD (HW RAID) 5TB 200Mbps $204/mo
Intel E5-2630v4 (10x2.2GHz) 96GB 2x512GB SSD + 2x960GB SSD (HW RAID) 5TB 200Mbps $212/mo
Intel E5-2620v4 (8x2.1GHz) 64GB 8x2TB SATA (HW RAID) 5TB 200Mbps $193/mo

Offer Information, Terms & Conditions:
The above prices are recurring & no coupon code is required to avail the reduced pricing. The offer is valid till the stocks last. If the mentioned server offer is no longer available the it is probably out of stock. Do contact us as we’ll be happy to provide you with a custom reasonable priced solution.
Please view our Terms & Conditions found on our website before ordering. There is absolutely no refunds for the above offers unless there is proven issue from Artnet’s end & thus reviewed case by case basis.

To place order please go here: Artnet Black Friday 2020

Datacenter Location: Gdańsk, Poland (video tour)
LookingGlass: https://lg.artnet.pl

Artnet is not a reseller, we own all our hardware and the datacenter.

All servers include:

  • Custom in-house panel to control the server
  • Unlimited OS Reloads
  • No Setup Fees (or hidden charges)
  • Stable & Quality network (99.982% SLA)
  • 1 IPv4
  • IPv6 (on demand)

Payment Methods: Paypal, PayU, Credit/Debit Cards, Bitcoin & Altcoins, & many more.
